name: Karla Campbell Starling
text: Staff was a great help and upbeat. Jacob was great.  He explained everything and had great suggestions. The food was filling. We got pretzel bites, garlic cheese sticks and a 1/2 sausage & pineapple pizza and 1/2 beef & mushroom trio. Pizza was crunchy and crusty.

name: Nick and Silke Jager
text: We did a half and half pizza that had two different sauces. Usually can't do that. The food and service was good but the place smells funky, it's attached to a motel, that might be why. It could use a good cleaning, especially the windows and floors.

name: Lynn Pethick
text: Great atmosphere great service thank you Lash for being so curtious and a great waitress. First time there but certainly won't be our last. Great food!!

name: Avi Pandit
text:
The straight up Coolest Mellow Mushroom I've been to yet...

The exterior immediately caught my attention as we turned in. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Foster
text: Mellow Mushroom is an amazing place with incredible food. Their staff is amazing and they have a good menu variety. Furthermore, kids get a free pizza slice and a soft pretzel on Sundays. If you have a teen (or are you are one like me) you ‚Ä¶More

name: Candace Rice
text: Our waiter was working hard! He was the host, the waiter and the bus boy. We never wanted for anything. We were sitted quickly, he took our order and the food came out quickly. He was friendly and wonderful and I wish I remembered his name because he deserves a raise. Our food was delicious and the portions were large.

name: michelle haney
text: When we were there I just left the hospital and didn't feel like eating but he wanted to go so we did and it was really good, more than good it was fantastic. Our waitress was very nice and helpful and went beyond her duties as a wait person. He loved it also and said he can't wait until next time. I am so glad we stopped

name: jessica sullens
text: I have always had great experiences with Mellow Mushroom. The servers have gone above and beyond making sure we had a great time and enjoyed our food each and every time we have been. Have loved everything we have ever ordered and the menu is reasonably priced.

name: Harry Correll
text: As great, helpful, and delicious as usual. I'm very, very sad that there's not much time left to enjoy their business.

name: Ezra Anderson
text: Mellow Mushroom never fails to satisfy. I've found that no matter what pizza I get here, I end up feeling pleased. The staff are exceedingly nice and clearly know a good bit about customer service. I'd say this is one of the better pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Glykas
text: A very reasonably priced place.  The pizza was better than fair(the sauce makes it!) Calzones are HUGE. .Will definitely revisit. Service was very good.    Wish it wasn't so loud inside though.

name: Jamie Wilson
text: üçïLove their food but it seems to take a long time for the food to arrive. I've never had a bad meal or poor service. It's worth a try - just be prepared to wait.

name: Chris Smith
text: Great pizza and best mellow mushroom I've been too

name: Amanda Gold
text: Fantastic food and beer. Fair prices for the most part. The patio is exceptionally nice on warmer days and the staff is very friendly. I recommend stopping by for a bite or a cold beer if you're in the area!!!

name: Cameron Lusk
text: Awesome pizza with an awesome staff. Worth every penny. Love the atmosphere and decorations, really brings you into a mellow and cool mood. Beer selection is great. Best place for a pizza date and now bite squad delivers too!

name: Nikki Ruppe
text: Always wonderful. Pizza is great. Staff is amazing and willing to modify menu items. They brought my 8 month old sliced avocado even though it isn't on the menu. Not very quick but worth the wait.

name: Dennis Smith
text: First the good, the pizza was fantastic however the outside space needs an upgrade and the people I did not find friendly. We had a Ceiling fan come apart while we were sitting there narrowly missing us with the blades and really no one cared.

name: BK Kapadia
text: My family of 5 and another family of 5 (4 adults, 6 kids) went here Sunday for lunch and I wanted to let someone know that our waitress, Sandra, was amazing. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Williams
text: I‚Äôm am heartbroken , disheartened and confused as to why they will be closing . I absolutely love their pizza. It‚Äôs one of the best places in town . Now what am I supposed to do ??? lol I don‚Äôt want to drive all the way to Greenville for a decent pie. By the time I get home it will be cold ‚òπ  Mellow Mushroom you will truly be missed.

name: Drew Williams
text: Amazing server. She's been there over 8 years and was very attentive to our group!

name: Brittany Fowler
text: Awesome food! Awesome environment!! Jay Dee is there on Sundays with his OUT-OF-THIS-WORLD Balloon art!! A true treat for our son, and anyone's  kids for that matter!!

name: Ana Carcamos
text: AWESOME PEOPLE AND FOOD. The waiter Sara is very nice and sweet. The food is absolutely delicious. Coming here every Saturday!

name: Jeremy Ward
text: I usually really like Mellow Mushroom. This location, though, is a bit dingy compared to others, doesn't really have the Mellow Mushroom spirit, seems more like an old Irish pub. Also, pizza took almost an hour to come out. It was good, though.

name: Rebecca isaak
text: Best Pizza EVER!!!! And the Tuesday night beer specials made it even better! Who doesn‚Äôt love good pizza and beer! Service was awesome and friendly. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience!

name: Jake Wilbanks
text: Great food brought out fresh. Great fast and friendly service.

name: Pierce Burch
text: Great, friendly staff/management. Food tastes great. Nice selection of drinks too. Would recommend!

name: Aidan Driscoll
text: Very good food. We came in on a day of little service because there were so few customers that day. We still received excellent service!

name: Lucy McElroy
text: Every time I go to Mellow, it‚Äôs inviting and well-organized. Best thing to order is pretzels and beer cheese... Also the greek salad. I know that‚Äôs not pizza, but they‚Äôre much more than a pizza place. If you need pizza, get the mushroom one. Food comes out quick and the servers are down-to-earth and attentive. Worth every penny!

name: Brian
text: Always enjoy.... I love the Spinach / Apple salad w Raspberry vinaigrette dressing... Yum! ‚Ä¶More

name: LeftTitFrostbit
text: Food is great but the wait is not.. I might go back on another occasion but probably not soon.. love the atmosphere though would be a good place to kill time and chill with friends

name: Veronica Bell
text: The pizzas are always delicious and the service is great. I always get my pizzas halved so I can try more flavors. My mom and I bought 3 pizzas halved so we were able to try 6 different flavors. Of course we couldn't eat it all but their pizzas reheat well in the oven.

name: Heather Rollins
text: Friendly welcome, generous portions. Loved the house made croutons in my Caesar salad, which was anything but little!

name: 2k dce0511
text: Very chill atmosphere and crew working the night I was there. Amazing pizza and quick but friendly service

name: Carlos Gomez
text: Nice spot for tasty food and tasty beers.  Good prices, staff is nice.

name: Jay M
text: This location was our go to Mellow Mushroom since we have lost faith at the Greenville location. Looks like we will not be returning to the Spartanburg location either.                                                                      We ‚Ä¶More

text:
Food was good
Price was high. Hostess was great. Waiter Josh was high on something. Quite oviobvsly. The people sitting near me mentioned it also. P.S. I have owned 6 pizza franchises in the past and know what's up.

name: Eric Allison
text: Really loved the pizza! Jordyn, our server, was awesome too! We'll definitely be back for more. Hopefully, Jordyn will be working and can wait on us again! Five stars all the way!

name: Jason Crisp

name: Elayna Hutchins

text: The only reason I didn't give them a higher score is due the price. However the food was good and good serving size. But feel that the prices where a little too high. Service was good. Atmosphere was great .

text: I loved the pizza it was soooooo good! But,the problem was that they had NO more wings at ALL when I went there. I was so sad but,at least the pizza was good.üòûü§£üòúüò¢

text: Greek salad was tasty but mellowterranean  and cheese pizza was very bland.  Manager gave a 25% discount and coupon for next visit.  They get 1 more chance on pizza.  Hope they don't strike out. Server was good.

text: It takes a very long time to get your food. The food is delicious but they make you wait for it. The wait is bad enough that I think the two-star is justified. I've found this to be true at every Mellow Mushroom: awful service, delicious food.

text: Depends on what you get. We build our own pizza which has given us the best odds of getting something is good. Service is hot and miss

name: Cassie Littlejohn
text: The food was great and the service was great. We had Brandon as our waitor and he was very nice and kept up with our table very well.

name: Donnie Burton
text: This place is awesome, from the entertainment to the staff, friendly an curtious, I had the meaty pizza an Bud light, definitely would return.

name: Eden Evatt

name: Jeremy Dalton
text: Our waitress Sandra was great!  The food was great, service was good, and the pizza I ordered was well prepared!  Thanks for making my daughter and I feel welcome in your establishment.

name: Anthony Raynor
text: It's a good location for a medium sized custom Pizza operation. There are numerous options of pizza and other fast-food items. It's in a fairly odd location and the parking can be difficult. The staff are friendly and the selection is good there is outside seating as well

name: Stephanie Nicole
text: Yum!  The pizza is so good, and the atmosphere is fun and funky, all the menus were decorated differently and there was a giant mushroom outside. I ordered their mushroom soup which was delicious, sadly cold though.

name: Jesse King

name: Michael Whitt

Get the mighty meaty yall.

text: Pizza came out doughy, they made another, took 45 minutes,  came out burnt, wait staff was trying to joke about it with us, but just added insult to injury,  we will never go back or recommend this awful place
